title: Move Daily Task off homepage into new Tasks menu with Task 1–3 pages

requirements.summary: Simplify the Home page to only show the existing Welcome section and a single "Join My Team" call-to-action while keeping existing SEO metadata.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting "/" displays the Welcome section and exactly one prominent button labeled "Join My Team".
The "Daily Task" section no longer appears on the Home page.
The Home page no longer renders the hero section, TimeBucks/TranscribeMe sections, ad banner section, feature cards, or the "Latest from the Blog" section.
The Home page continues to set SEO metadata via the existing Seo component (title/description/path).

file_operations.description: Remove HeroSection, DailyTaskSection, TimeBucks, TranscribeMe, ads, feature cards, and blog teaser blocks so the page renders only: (1) the existing WelcomeSection and (2) a single prominent "Join My Team" CTA, while retaining the existing Seo usage (title/description/path). Use the existing neon button class system for styling (consistent with current neon buttons).

requirements.summary: Implement the Home page "Join My Team" button with an explicit in-app destination and neon-consistent accessible styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The "Join My Team" button is visible without requiring scrolling on common desktop/mobile viewports (where feasible).
Clicking "Join My Team" navigates the user to a defined in-app route (not a dead link).
Button has accessible focus styles and remains readable over the background theme.

file_operations.description: Implement the "Join My Team" CTA as an in-app navigation link (TanStack Router Link) targeting the chosen Tasks route (e.g., Task 1 page) and style it using the existing neon button classes with visible focus ring. If using shadcn-ui elements (e.g., Button), compose them from existing components without modification. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a new desktop header navigation menu item "Tasks" with sub-links to Task 1, Task 2, and Task 3 routes while preserving existing header links.
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop header navigation includes a visible "Tasks" item.
"Tasks" provides access to links labeled "Task 1", "Task 2", and "Task 3".
Each sub-link navigates to its corresponding dedicated task page route.
Existing header items (Home, Blog, About Me) remain present and functional.

file_operations.description: Add a "Tasks" desktop navigation item that reveals sub-links "Task 1", "Task 2", and "Task 3" using TanStack Router Link, ensuring existing Home/Blog/About Me remain unchanged and active-state logic still works for existing items.

requirements.summary: Add a "Tasks" section to the mobile menu with Task 1–3 links while preserving existing Bengali sections and Admin Facebook links/behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Mobile menu includes a "Tasks" section with links "Task 1", "Task 2", and "Task 3".
The existing Bengali labels “কাজ”, “পেমেন্ট প্রুফ”, and “সাহায্য” remain exactly as-is and still render in the mobile menu.
The existing Admin 1/Admin 2 links under “সাহায্য” remain unchanged and still open their Facebook URLs.
Tapping any Tasks link closes the mobile menu and navigates to the correct task page.

file_operations.description: Add a new "Tasks" section with in-app links to Task 1/2/3 that call onClose when tapped (to close the menu) and navigate without full reload. Keep existing Bengali items (“কাজ”, “পেমেন্ট প্রুফ”, “সাহায্য”) and HELP_LINKS mapping exactly as-is and unchanged in behavior.

requirements.summary: Create and register Task 1/2/3 pages as TanStack Router routes, each with Seo metadata.
acceptanceCriteria: There are three distinct routes for Task 1, Task 2, and Task 3.
Each route renders a page with an appropriate page title/heading (Task 1/2/3).
Routes are reachable directly by URL entry and via navigation links.
Each task page sets SEO metadata (title/description/path) using the existing Seo component.

file_operations.description: Create the Task 1 page component that renders a Task 1 heading, uses the existing Seo component (title/description/path), and includes the shared task interaction UI component.
Create the Task 2 page component that renders a Task 2 heading, uses the existing Seo component (title/description/path), and includes the shared task interaction UI component.
Create the Task 3 page component that renders a Task 3 heading, uses the existing Seo component (title/description/path), and includes the shared task interaction UI component.
Register three new TanStack Router routes for Task 1/Task 2/Task 3 in the route tree so they can be navigated to by URL and from the new navigation links.

requirements.summary: Render the task interaction UI on each Task page with a "Start Work" external link action and an in-page Secret Code submission success flow (no reload/navigation).
acceptanceCriteria: Each Task page includes a button labeled "Start Work" that opens a task link in a new tab/window (matching the existing behavior used previously).
Each Task page includes a labeled input field "Secret Code" and a "Submit" button.
Submitting a non-empty secret code shows an on-page success state/message and clears the input without full-page reload or route navigation.
User-facing text for the task UI on these pages is in English (at minimum: "Start Work", "Secret Code", "Submit", and the success message).

file_operations.description: Create a reusable task interaction component that provides: a "Start Work" action that opens a provided task URL in a new tab/window, and a controlled "Secret Code" input with "Submit" handling that prevents default, shows an on-page English success message, and clears the input without reloading/navigating. Compose UI using shadcn-ui components (Button/Input/Label from the existing frontend/src/components/ui library) without modifying them; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire TaskInteractionCard into Task 1 with a concrete task link value and ensure all UI labels/messages are in English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire TaskInteractionCard into Task 2 with a concrete task link value and ensure all UI labels/messages are in English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire TaskInteractionCard into Task 3 with a concrete task link value and ensure all UI labels/messages are in English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update the static sitemap.xml to include the three new Task page URLs while keeping existing entries intact and valid.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/sitemap.xml` contains entries for the three new task page URLs.
Existing sitemap entries for Home, Blog, About, and blog posts remain present and unchanged unless required for correctness.
The sitemap remains valid XML.

file_operations.description: Add three new <url> entries for the Task 1, Task 2, and Task 3 routes (matching the new in-app route paths) while preserving existing entries and ensuring the file remains valid XML.
